Outcome: Mesiodistal movement of the upper first permanent molar
Reasons for GRADE if not High: 7 studies at overall high (1), unclear (5) and low (1) risk of bias. Substantial heterogeneity I2 78% although mean difference (MD) of 6/7 studies in favour of surgical intervention. Outcome incompletely reported in 2 additional studies at overall high risk of bias (both studies reported in favour of surgical anchorage) and not reported in 1 study at overall high risk of bias
Small studies likely underpowered; imprecision of result. 2 studies at unclear risk of bias, 1 study at high risk of bias
